keyword: calories in a red lobster biscuit
title: Calories in a Red Lobster Biscuit
meta_description: Discover calories in a red lobster biscuit, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for this popular Cheddar Bay treat.
h1: Calories in a Red Lobster Biscuit
assumptions: Standard Cheddar Bay Biscuit from Red Lobster, freshly baked, including cheddar cheese and garlic butter topping.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant preparation, portion size, and recipe changes; check Red Lobster's menu for latest info.

quick_answer.text: One Red Lobster Cheddar Bay Biscuit has about 160 kcal, with 9 g fat and 3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Red Lobster biscuit?
faqs.a: Approximately 160 kcal per Cheddar Bay Biscuit.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a red lobster biscuit?
faqs.a: About 16 g carbs, including 0.5 g fiber and 1 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a Red Lobster biscuit high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 380 mg sodium per biscuit due to cheese and seasoning.

faqs.q: How much fat in one red lobster biscuit?
faqs.a: 9 g total fat, with 4 g saturated fat from butter and cheese.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie red lobster biscuit at home?
faqs.a: Yes, reduce butter or cheese to cut ~30-50 kcal per biscuit.
